casename: Re Will of Samuel Emily, deceased
counsel: N Ganesan (N Ganesan & Associates) for the Executrix/Trustee; Chelva Rajah SC (Tan, Rajah & Cheah) for beneficiaries 1 to 5, 7 to 9 and 12 to 14 in the will; TPB Menon (Wee Swee Teow & Co) for beneficiaries 6 and 11 in the will and the next of kin of the testatrix; Philip Loh (Philip Loh & Co) for beneficiary 10 in the will (Lam family)
tags-parsed: Succession and Wills/Construction/Will/Will drafted in casual fashion with no residuary clause/Gifts purportedly for charity/Names and addresses of charitable institutions not properly ascertained/Testatrix's intention/Admission of extrinsic evidence to determine intention of testatrix/Whether gifts fail for want of certainty/Intestacy as to residuary estate/Bona vacantia/s 102 Evidence Act (Cap 97, 1997 Ed)
